ing: 1 cup granular no-calorie sucralose sweetener (such as SplendaÂ®)
des: "You can throw together this cinnamon-accented hot chocolate mix in just moments."
ins: Combine milk powder, sweetener, creamer, cocoa, and cinnamon in a bowl; add marshmallows and mix. Store in an airtight container in a cool dry place for up to 3 months.
